titles.title: You've Got To Lay Your Isaac Down

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You've got to lay your Isaac down.
You've got to lay your Isaac down.
You've got to lay your Isaac down
On the altar of gold before you go in the Holiest of all.
You've got to lay your Isaac down.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You've got to lay the promise down, etc.
You've got to lay your self-will down, etc.
You've got to lay your self-life down, etc.
You've got to lay your all down, etc.
